repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y wget python3 python3-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir flask

WORKDIR /opt/
RUN wget https://gethstore.blob.core.windows.net/builds/geth-linux-amd64-1.8.15-89451f7c.tar.gz && \
    tar xzvf geth-linux-amd64-1.8.15-89451f7c.tar.gz && rm geth-linux-amd64-1.8.15-89451f7c.tar.gz
ENV PATH $PATH:/opt/geth-linux-amd64-1.8.15-89451f7c
